name: Monsterseed
description: Monsterseed is a brand new type of monster - collection RPG. The player has to gather monster eggs, incubate them and then send their collection of different monsters into battle. The player controls Master Daniel, who is a ruler of monsters. With Daniel, you have to venture through a dungeon map, fighting enemy rulers and monsters and clearing given tasks, By using separate memory cards you can make these monsters fight against each other. With "Monster Seed" you can enjoy the fun of creating your own ultra-powerful monsters.
